languages.text: "В этом нет необходимости". {n}Дознаватель отвечает слишком поспешно, словно стремясь свернуть разговор побыстрее.{/n} "В другой ситуации я бы не отказался побеседовать с вами обстоятельнее... но вас ждут ваши подданные".

traits.locale_text: "В этом нет необходимости". {n}Дознаватель, кажется, отвечает слишком поспешно, словно стремясь свернуть разговор побыстрее.{/n} "В другой ситуации я бы не отказался побеседовать с вами обстоятельнее... но вас ждут тысячи ваших подданных, уповающих на каждое ваше слово".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."
languages.original_text: "В этом нет необходимости". {n}Дознаватель отвечает слишком поспешно, словно стремясь свернуть разговор побыстрее.{/n} "В другой ситуации я бы не отказался побеседовать с вами обстоятельнее... но вас ждут ваши подданные".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “没有这个必要。”{n}海因里希的回答非常仓促，似乎急于结束这场对话。{/n}“如果是换做其他情况，我很愿意和你好好谈谈……但你的臣民们还在等着你呢。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

traits.locale_text: “没有这个必要。”{n}海因里希的回答非常仓促，似乎急于结束这场对话。{/n}“如果是换做其他情况，我很愿意和你好好谈谈……但你的臣民们还在等着你呢。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No es necesario». {n}La respuesta del interrogador es precipitada, como si quisiera terminar la conversación cuanto antes.{/n} «En otras circunstancias estaría encantado de charlar más con usted, pero sus súbditos le esperan».
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

traits.locale_text: «No es necesario». {n}La respuesta del interrogador es precipitada, como si quisiera terminar la conversación cuanto antes.{/n} «En otras circunstancias estaría encantado de charlar más con usted, pero sus súbditos le esperan».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「その必要はない」{n}インテロゲイターの答えはあまりにも早く、まるで一刻も早く話を終わらせたいかのようだった。{/n}「別の状況であれば、あなたともっと長く話す機会を歓迎するが…あなたの臣下が待っている」
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

traits.locale_text: 「その必要はない」{n}インテロゲイターの答えはあまりにも早く、まるで一刻も早く話を終わらせたいかのようだった。{/n}「別の状況であれば、あなたともっと長く話す機会を歓迎するが…あなたの臣下が待っている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est inutile, » {n}répond précipitamment l'interrogateur, comme pour mettre un terme à cette conversation aussi vite que possible.{/n} « Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais été ravi d'avoir l'occasion de discuter longuement avec vous, mais... vos sujets ont besoin de vous. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

traits.locale_text: « C'est inutile, » {n}répond précipitamment l'interrogateur, comme pour mettre un terme à cette conversation aussi vite que possible.{/n} « Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais été ravi d'avoir l'occasion de discuter longuement avec vous, mais... vos sujets ont besoin de vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist nicht nötig." {n}Der Interrogator antwortet sehr schnell, so als wolle er das Gespräch so schnell wie möglich beenden.{/n} "Unter anderen Umständen würde ich mich sehr gerne ausführlicher mit Euch unterhalten ... aber Eure Untertanen warten."
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht nötig." {n}Der Interrogator antwortet sehr schnell, so als wolle er das Gespräch so schnell wie möglich beenden.{/n} "Unter anderen Umständen würde ich mich sehr gerne ausführlicher mit Euch unterhalten ... aber Eure Untertanen warten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."

languages.text: "Gerek yok." {n}Sorgucu'nun cevabı, âdeta sohbeti bir an önce bitirmeye hevesliymiş gibi büyük bir hızla geliyor.{/n} "Farklı koşullar altında seninle uzun uzadıya konuşma şansını büyük bir memnuniyetle karşılardım ancak... Tebaan seni bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "There is no need." {n}The Interrogator's answer comes too quickly, as if he is eager to end the conversation as soon as possible.{/n} "Under different circumstances, I would welcome the chance to speak with you at greater length... but your subjects await."
